data.name: POSSESSED BLOODY ASYLUM
data.detailed_description:
In this virtual reality experience you suddenly wake up and you don't know where you are or how you got there. Find your way out alive!
You must look for a weapon and ammunition to survive. Go around the place looking for keys that will allow you to go to the next level.
The game has an autosave per level.
This is no longer a GAME!


* As soon as START GAME is pressed, knowledge of a specific language is not required.

WARNING: This experience has Jump Scares! You're warned!

Requires a virtual reality headset to play!

data.short_description: Possessed bloody Asylum is not for everyone! This Game is not recommended to impressionable gamers. The designer takes you through a short but extreme experience, long enough to enjoy but also face PANIC! The Game requieres you to be aware, fast, brave and clever to survive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel-i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requiere el visor de realidad virtual
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel-i7 8700k / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or greater
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requiere el visor de realidad virtual

VR Shooter, Zombies, Blood, violence and Gore.
Take in mind that some of the content  may not be suitable for all public or ages!
Some contend my be disturbing!
